entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Catharines
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:29 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 03:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Temperature: 3.2°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Humidity: 76 %
Dewpoint: -0.7°C
Wind: WSW 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then light near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing late in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
